mapper.sql: from t_borrowapply ba,t_borrowdetail bd,t_bz bz,t_jklx j,t_sway s where ba.baid = bd.baid and ba.bzid = bz.bzid and ba.lxid = j.lxid and ba.sid = s.sid and ba.state = 1

if.test: query != null and query.cpname != null and query.cpname != ''

mapper.select:
select ba.baid,ba.rname,ba.money,ba.state,ba.term, bd.bdid as bdid,bd.nprofit as nprofit,bd.cpname as cpname,bd.fpic as fpic,bd.ypic as ypic, bd.qpic as qpic,bd.tpic as tpic,bd.mpurpose as mpurpose,bd.hksource as hksource,bd.suggest as suggest, bd.xmdescrip as xmdescrip,bd.guarantee as guarantee,bd.way as way, bz.bzid as bzid,bz.bzname as bzname,j.lxid as lxid,j.lxname as lxname,s.sid as sid,s.way as way
limit #{pager.beginIndex}, #{pager.pageSize}
